name: Scary Math
description: Scary Math is an educational game. Here players need to choose right or wrong from the following equations. Each equation provides a few seconds to choose the correct selection. Scary Math: Learn with Monster Math, the educational game that improves math skills including addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, and family maths. Free monster math bundle Games for everyone from kids to adults. Best maths practice game to train your brain & is designed for all ages including kids, girls and boys 1st 2nd, adults including parents and grandparents. Smallest in size Maths App on Google Play ! Easiest multiplication and division games with Addition and Subtraction games all math reflex in one app. Increase your brain power with an excellent educational game for learning mathematics for sushi monsters and adults of all ages. Math games are free with an xtra math mathematics monster.
